entities.name: firenze
entities.description: Firenze is a centaur who agrees with the idea that death is better than being cursed. He mentions that there is something hidden in the school that can bring someone back to full strength and power.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid had told Harry that some people believe Voldemort died, but Hagrid thinks it's unlikely.

entities.name: voldeort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as someone who has waited many years to return to power and has clung to life awaiting their chance.

relationships.description: Firenze agrees with Harry's idea that death is better than being cursed.
